13.title: Digging Deep
13.plot: Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson know cream rises to the top, but they're interested in the layer just below. From a butt-naked rock climber, to the never ending twerk, they're digging deep to find the best no-getters out there!

14.title: Hardly Working
14.plot: Hosts Chris and April are on the lookout for people who give it their all despite not being all there. From a geriatric gymnast, to the ultimate wedgie...we celebrate those who never give up - even though they probably should.

15.title: Falling Short
15.plot: Falling Short: Hosts Chris and April love those who have a recipe for success but are missing a few ingredients. From a bikini-clad nunchuck artist, to the ultimate video remix battle...we're serving up a piping hot bowl of humble soup. Enjoy!

16.title: There It Isn't
16.plot: From metal dudes with office jobs, to a gang of nude cyclists, to a grandma who flips for water sports...hosts Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson do a bang-up job of showcasing those who aim high but come up the slightest bit short.

17.title: No Cigar
17.plot: From a dad with a DIY rollercoaster, to the world's smallest gymnast...this show highlights those brave souls who think on their feet but don't always land on them.

18.title: Flying Low
18.plot: From a father/son beatboxing duo, to a cat with a tissue issue, this show celebrates those who shoot for the stars but don't quite make it past liftoff.

20.title: If at First You Don't Succeed
20.plot: From a piano-playing horse, to a cliff jumper who thinks he's Mary Poppins, we're watching those who give it their all and still come up short.

21.title: Half Baked
21.plot: From homemade haircuts, to guys rebooting their computer with a baseball bat, we've got the still-frozen-on-the-inside microwave burritos of humanity.

22.title: Spectacular Defeat
22.plot: From a baby ninja warrior, to a flopping pianist, to a sloth with no concept of personal space...we celebrate those with a skill for avoiding success.

23.title: Go For The Gold
23.plot: Tonight we celebrate those with gold aspirations, but bronze abilities. From the residents of a town called Dildo, to a base-jumping monkey, we find out if they're the best of the worst, or the worst of the best!

24.title: Down But Not Out
24.plot: From snack-stealing monkeys and fighting grandmas, to a guy solving Rubik's cubes in a speedo...these people won't win, but they'll go down swinging! Chris and April give a standing 10 count to see who will get up to finish the fight.

1.title: Grasping for Greatness
1.plot: Hosts Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson celebrate the people, places and things that try so hard to succeed but come up just a bit short. Check out people pole dancing in India, watch a guy totally confuse his girl in bed, and you have to see the amazing way this one guy puts on his pants! Plus, stick around to see which clip Chris and April save as the best for last!

2.title: Missed It By That Much
2.plot: Chris Fairbanks, April Richardson, and the Almost Genius cast are back with a smorgasbord of clips featuring people with some pretty big ideas, not all of which pan out in the end. See a band of marauding monkeys wreak havoc on a freshly baked batch of bread, learn how to properly kiss your mate from a couple of pros, and witness the awesome chi of the office karate master! Plus, stick around to see which clip gets saved as the best for last!

3.title: A Day Late and a Dollar Short
3.plot: Hosts Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson celebrate the people, places, and things that try so hard to succeed but come up just a bit short. Check out a real-life lightsaber academy, the worst dating profiles EVER, plus a dance-off that's so bad, it's good! And make sure to stick around to see which clip is so brilliant, Chris and April had to save it as the best for last!

4.title: Desperately Seeking Super
4.plot: Hosts Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson shine the spotlight on those who strive for greatness but just miss the mark. Then, get ready for a mystical owl whisper, Zombie Apocalypse camp and a skateboarding taco.

6.title: For Effort
6.plot: Hosts Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson celebrate those who reach for the stars, but fall flat on their asses - from the best local mall commercial ever, to a man who can drive a car and play the recorder at the same time.

7.title: Flying Too Close to the Sun
7.plot: Included: dancing marine; domesticated bear; back to the future.

8.title: Standing Ovation
8.plot: Hosts Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson give a round of applause to those who aren't quite ready for the spotlight. From a group of friends who get sexy on the slip 'n slide, to a dolphin Don Juan, to a funeral home dance party... this episode gives a tip of the hat to those who try their best but don't quite make the mark.

9.title: Yes You Can
9.plot: Hosts Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson are handing out participation trophies all around! From past-their-prime partiers, to a high speed wardrobe malfunction, to a salsa-making monkey... we salute those competitors who struggle just to find the finish line.

10.title: We're #2
10.plot: Hosts Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson turn lemons into hilarious lemonade, making the most of people who've soured on success. From a baby who laughs like a troll, to a pooch getting his snout massaged, to a cake that screams for mercy, we're celebrating the ones who've peaked at number two.

11.title: Close But No Cigar
11.plot: Included: a banana-wielding Italian; to a literal pop-eye.

12.title: Sports Edition
12.plot: From sprinting sumos, to super fan freakouts, and more balls to the face than you can count...hosts Chris Fairbanks and April Richardson celebrate those athletes who go for the gold but settle for silver.

18.title: Flying Low
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

19.title: So Close Yet So Far
19.plot: Chris and April celebrate those who shoot for the moon...and hit a tree on the way down. From the gorilla on a wakeboard, to a girl twerking with her face, to a unicycle fail montage - a failure to launch has never been so fun.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Almost Genius is a self-contained, half-hour comedy series that celebrates the people, places and things that try so hard to succeed but come up just a bit short. Hosted by April Richardson and Chris Fairbanks, the show features comedians and performers digitally inserted into viral videos to comment on and congratulate people for their bravery and ingenuity in snatching defeat from the jaws of victory. But Almost Genius doesn't mock, because as everyone knows, almost is awesome...and genius.
imdb.title: Almost Genius
plot: Hosted by April Richardson and Chris Fairbanks, the show features comedians and performers digitally inserted into viral videos to comment on.::Geno LSP

_Almost Genius_ (qv) is a self-contained, half-hour comedy series that celebrates the people, places and things that try so hard to succeed but come up just a bit short. Hosted by April Richardson and Chris Fairbanks, the show features comedians and performers digitally inserted into viral videos to comment on and congratulate people for their bravery and ingenuity in snatching defeat from the jaws of victory. But _Almost Genius_ (qv) doesn't mock, because as everyone knows, almost is awesome...and genius.::Geno LSP
